ModMetaData.name: Biomes! Core
ModMetaData.author: The Biomes Mod Team
ModMetaData.description:
The core module for the Biomes! mods. Necessary for all of the Biomes! modules.
[BiomesKit](https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2153006237) is included by default. This is added in a way that's compatible to having the mod present or not, either way your pawns and animals will be able to swim now in custom biomes!
